items.title: Rams still hope injured Adams can play in Seattle
items.description: The Rams have not ruled out Davante Adams for Thursday night's showdown against the Seahawks, despite the star wide receiver's hamstring injury.

items.title: FIFA slashes some WC ticket prices after backlash
items.description: FIFA slashed the price of some World Cup tickets for teams' most loyal fans following a global backlash.
